Content Extractors¶

The extractors module handles parsing and extracting structured data from raw HTML content.

Wired Content Extractor¶

class the_data_packet.extractors.WiredContentExtractor[source]¶

Bases: object

Extracts article data from Wired.com HTML pages.

__init__() → None[source]¶

Initialize the content extractor.

The WiredContentExtractor is specialized for extracting article data from Wired.com pages. It uses multiple extraction strategies with fallbacks to ensure robust parsing.

Extraction Methods:

  • Title Extraction: Tries page title, H1 tags, and OpenGraph meta tags

  • Author Extraction: Searches meta tags, JSON-LD structured data, and byline elements

  • Content Extraction: Identifies article content areas and filters promotional text

Example Usage:

from the_data_packet.extractors import WiredContentExtractor
from the_data_packet.clients import HTTPClient

# Create extractor
extractor = WiredContentExtractor()

# Get a webpage
client = HTTPClient()
soup = client.get_page("https://www.wired.com/story/example/")

# Extract article data
article = extractor.extract(soup, url="https://www.wired.com/story/example/")

print(f"Title: {article.title}")
print(f"Author: {article.author}")
print(f"Content length: {len(article.content)} characters")

# Clean up
client.close()
SKIP_PATTERNS = ['subscribe to wired', 'most popular', 'related stories', 'advertisement', 'get wired', 'sign up']¶
__init__() → None[source]¶

Initialize the content extractor.

extract(soup: BeautifulSoup, url: str | None = None) → ArticleData[source]¶

Extract article data from a BeautifulSoup object of a Wired article page.

Parameters:

  • soup – BeautifulSoup object of the article page

  • url – Optional URL of the article

Returns:

ArticleData object with extracted information

Private Methods¶

The extractor uses several private methods for robust content extraction:

WiredContentExtractor._extract_title(soup: BeautifulSoup) → str | None[source]¶

Extract the article title.

Extracts article titles using multiple fallback strategies.

WiredContentExtractor._extract_author(soup: BeautifulSoup) → str | None[source]¶

Extract the article author.

Extracts author information from various page elements.

WiredContentExtractor._extract_content(soup: BeautifulSoup) → str | None[source]¶

Extract the article content.

Extracts the main article content while filtering out promotional text.

WiredContentExtractor._extract_author_from_json_ld(soup: BeautifulSoup) → str | None[source]¶

Extract author from JSON-LD structured data.

Parses JSON-LD structured data to extract author information.
